statements: SELECT * FROM content_versions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content, version_number FROM content_versions WHERE version_number > 3;
SELECT id, created_at FROM content_versions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_versions WHERE content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT MAX(version_number) FROM content_versions;
SELECT id, content, version_number, created_at FROM content_versions WHERE version_number > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, content FROM content_versions WHERE version_number <= 3 AND content LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY version_number ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT id, content, version_number FROM content_versions WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY version_number DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_versions WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, content, version_number, created_at FROM content_versions WHERE content IS NULL OR version_number = 1 ORDER BY id ASC, version_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentVersions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, content FROM ContentVersions WHERE version = 1;
SELECT id, version FROM ContentVersions WHERE content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM Revisions ORDER BY revision_date ASC;
SELECT id, content_id, revision_number FROM Revisions WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content, version FROM ContentVersions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ContentVersions WHERE version > 2 ORDER BY version DESC;
SELECT id, content, version FROM ContentVersions JOIN Revisions ON ContentVersions.id = Revisions.content_id WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY version ASC, revision_number DESC;

SELECT ContentVersions.id, COUNT(*) AS total_revisions FROM ContentVersions JOIN Revisions ON ContentVersions.id = Revisions.content_id GROUP BY ContentVersions.id HAVING total_revisions > 5 ORDER BY total_revisions DESC;
SELECT content_id, MAX(revision_number) AS latest_revision FROM Revisions GROUP BY content_id HAVING latest_revision < 10 ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ContentVersions;
SELECT content_id, version_date FROM ContentVersions ORDER BY version_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, version_date FROM ContentVersions WHERE content_id=1;
SELECT content_id, version_date FROM ContentVersions WHERE version_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY version_date ASC;
SELECT content_id, content, version_date FROM ContentVersions JOIN ContentMetadata ON ContentVersions.content_id = ContentMetada.content_id WHERE ContentMetadata.content_owner='John Doe';
SELECT version_id, content_id, version_date, content FROM ContentVersions WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, version_id, revision_notes FROM ContentRevisions WHERE revision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT content_owner, content_name FROM ContentMetadata WHERE content_type = 'article' AND content_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT cv.content, cr.revision_content FROM ContentVersions cv JOIN ContentRevisions cr ON cv.version_id = cr.version_id WHERE cr.revision_id = 3;
SELECT content_id, content, content_owner FROM ContentVersions cv JOIN ContentMetadata cm ON cv.content_id = cm.content_id ORDER BY content_owner, content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ContentVersions;
SELECT id, content, created_at FROM ContentVersions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT version_number, revised_by FROM Revisions WHERE revision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM Roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT content, created_at FROM ContentVersions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT rv.revised_by, rv.revision_date, cv.content FROM Revisions rv JOIN ContentVersions cv ON rv.content_id = cv.id WHERE rv.revision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rv.content_id, rv.revised_by, cv.created_at FROM Revisions rv JOIN ContentVersions cv ON rv.content_id = cv.id ORDER BY rv.content_id ASC, cv.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM Users u JOIN Roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM ContentVersions;
SELECT id, version_number, author FROM ContentVersions WHERE author = 'John';
SELECT author, version_number, created_at FROM ContentVersions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Revisions WHERE revised_by = 'Alice' ORDER BY revision_date ASC;
SELECT author, version_number FROM ContentVersions WHERE version_number > 5;
SELECT * FROM Authors WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT author, created_at FROM ContentVersions WHERE version_number > 2 AND author = 'Alice' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT revision_id, revision_number, revised_by FROM Revisions WHERE revision_number = 10 OR revised_by = 'Bob';
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM Roles ORDER BY role_name;
SELECT c.id, c.content, r.revision_number FROM ContentVersions c JOIN Revisions r ON c.id = r.version_id WHERE r.revised_by = 'Alice' ORDER BY c.created_at DESC;
